mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inclinometer_info (station_id, machine_id, machine_id_nnu, point_num, point1_depth, point2_depth, point3_depth, point4_depth, point5_depth, point6_depth, in_time, data_v, in_operator, notes) VALUES (#{idGroup.station_id}, #{idGroup.machine_id}, #{idGroup.machine_id_nnu}, #{point_num}, #{point1_depth}, #{point2_depth}, #{point3_depth}, #{point4_depth}, #{point5_depth}, #{point6_depth}, #{in_time}, #{data_v}, #{in_operator}, #{notes})
